item.title: Report X-2025020310
item.description:
Report X-2025020310

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-04
  • City: VIRGINIA
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING PACKAGE HANDLING, A RATTLING AEROSOL NOISE WAS HEARD COMING FROM ONE AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FOUR FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF FILL-ONE MASTERBLEND, EACH AT 16 OZ. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED BY AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
